subject: Dakar Rally
Motorcycles, Motor Bikes and Motorscooters
Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: A Frenchman became a fatality in the Dakar Rally in Argentina. The body of the motorcyclist Pascal Terry, missing since Sunday, was found in dense bush between Santa Rosa and Puerto Madryn. Terry, a first-time Dakar racer, was near his motorbike without his helmet, but with food and water beside him. An autopsy revealed the 49-year-old Terry died of a pulmonary edema.
